short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save every copied text in Chrome with infinite clipboard history.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Infinite Clipboard Manager is your ultimate clipboard companion, designed to improve productivity and make managing copied text seamless. Never lose a piece of copied text again! This extension keeps track of everything you copy while browsing in Chrome and offers an intuitive interface to manage, search, and even export your clipboard history.

Key Features:
Infinite Clipboard History:
Automatically saves every piece of text you copy while browsing. Access your entire clipboard history at any time.

Search Functionality:
Quickly find specific items in your clipboard history with the built-in search bar. Ideal for users who frequently need to revisit old copies.

Export Clipboard History:
Easily export your entire clipboard history to a .txt file for safekeeping or sharing. This ensures you never lose your important data, even without a sync feature.

Clear Clipboard History:
Manage your storage with ease by clearing the clipboard history whenever needed.

User-Friendly Interface:
A sleek, modern design with intuitive navigation ensures a great user experience. Features like scrollable history and responsive buttons make managing copied items effortless.

Lightweight and Secure:
Designed with minimal resource usage and strict adherence to Chromeâ€™s security guidelines, ensuring your data is safe and private.
